title.narrative: Promoting gender equality in education in Viet Nam

description.narrative: While Viet Nam has made significant progress in promoting gender equality for the last 20 years, gender inequality is still prevalent, exhibited by instances of violence against girls and women and girls and women in rural, remote, mountainous, and ethnic minority areas being bound by customs and practices that limit their access to educational opportunities. Gender biases also hinder the access of girls to ICT and STEM Education, consequently limiting the number of girls choosing these fields of study and working in these fields. The proposed programme will address these issues through a concrete intervention of training of trainers for secondary school counsellors and a stocktaking exercise to identify the needs and challenges for the engagement of the youth, especially girls, in STEM.
